content: I’m about to return this item.  Beware that it DOES NOT have the option of rotating the video image. I had to install mine horizontally on my siding, and now the image is sideways with no way to correct it.  Also, and ultimately my reason for the low rating, is the fact that you have to pay a monthly subscription before any video will be saved.  This info needs to be made clear upfront in their sales ad.
title: Video image cannot be rotated.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Petro A.
content: Honestly , for the money it cost, I was expecting more , and with this being such a popular choice by so many people, I honestly don’t really see why that’s the case. Had really high expectations It isn’t terrible per say, but I really expected much better performance at night and integration with google home display to make my home smarter.
title: Not as I was expecting.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Stephen F.
content: I held out on buying a Ring Doorbell for a long time mainly because of the high price but finally found a package deal with the Amazon Echo Dot that I couldn't pass up. The Ring Doorbell has worked great for us so far.
title: Finally joined the rest of the world and bought a Ring

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Brittany
content: Amazing video quality. Gives us the peace of mind we need. I love it so much and can’t imagine going back to not having it. Also saves you money on your home insurance!! Make sure to ask your provider!
title: Must buy!! Amazing quality!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Brian Schneider
content: What I did not know until after I bought this that you have to pay for a service to keep the videos and pictures this doorbell takes.  I would not have bought this if I had known.
title: The fine print

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Tammera Miller
content: Purchased a different doorbell initially and I had to return it due to connectivity issues but so far the Ring doorbell has been perfect and I love all the app features. Alerts come through no matter if I’m home or away. I’m satisfied!
title: Clear Video/Connection

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Mrs. Camarillo
content: So I got mine today and was disappointing because it is missing the mounting bracket. I was confused and thought it was something I had to buy separately, but it turns out it had to be included with my purchase...annoyed already!
title: Missing Bracket

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: g6crew
content: Sound could be better- probably improved in later generations.
title: Cool

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: K. Blink
content: If I could give zero stars I would and the poor return system has me considering actually closing my amazon account. Could not even maintain a signal through set up. Very expensive and lots of hype for something that does not work at all. Horrible product horrible company and I am disgusted with Amazon for even selling it. I am returning the entire set immediately.
title: Do not buy- waste of money on junk

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Douglas Hayes
content: I'm sure everyone knows about RING doorbell by now, you can't go wrong, any mobile device will let you know if someone is near you or movement outside, it records so you can go back to look, will alert if you set it, will also alert you when battery is low. VERY EASY SETUP!
title: works as advertised

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: carlos diaz
content: I am happy with this camera, 3 dollars a month for service is a great deal for my peace of mind of being able to watch all record videos. I installed in my existing door bell connection and it was super easy. The longes part is to drill the holes to install witch took me about a minute. Wire connection is simple , no polarity needed.
title: Great camera and great service from ring

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Aaron Cummins
content: Very simple and straightforward installation. Took 10 minutes using the provided hardware. Hardwired to our old low voltage doorbell wires. Great picture quality night or day.
title: Simple install, great product

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Adam
content: We are super happy with this product!!!! Easy set up easy installation. I love how it can coordinate with Alexa so my kids can easily talk to the front door while I am in my home office in meetings to get people to go away without having to open the door lol We ordered two more for the other entrances. I feel 100% safer with these.
title: Love ring!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: T. Walters
content: This thing works exactly as expected.  Interfaces well with my Android phone.  The install was extremely simple.  Literally installed and ready to use in less than 10 minutes.  BTW, when they recommend installing at 4 feet above the floor, take them seriously as the camera is quite wide angle.  I am now tempted to get another for another part of the house.  Wish there was a less clumsy way to recharge the battery as is seems that you have to take the main unit off the door mount in order to plug it in for charge.
title: Why didn't I get one of these sooner

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Shaun Lim
content: ...don't even try to use the drill bit it came with! It's useless! The camera is amazing but the install is ridiculous with what's given if you're going to drill into brick. Make sure you have the right masonry drill bit AND the right kind of drill AND know how to drill into brick.
title: The product is great but...

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Tom C.
content: I should have bought the Ring first. Tried two before that were a little cheaper, but they did not work as expected. One did not work with Alexa the other was extremely slow to notify. Ring works perfectly every time and with Alexa. Very happy with product. My only complaint is that the battery doesn't last as long. But it charges very quickly.
title: RING doorbell outperforms the others

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: William Byrd
content: I have had this installed for 3 months and thought it was great. Now the lenses fogs up on the outside. The doorbell is useless in this condition. I have researched this and have discovered it’s wide spread problem with the Ring doorbells, even the Pro models. I have 8 Nest Google cameras outside that have never fogged up. I installed this doorbell on my garage entrance because of the good price range, very disappointed. Apparently Ring is using cheap plastic on the outside!
title: Condensation on outside!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Doug
content: I don’t write many reviews so here goes my thoughts on this. When it works it’s pretty good. I have a disabled dog that gets all excited when the doorbell rings so I figured this might help out...except my back door must be too far from the router. It’s less than 100ft. It doesn’t work a lick. So then I figured I’d give it a try as an outdoor camera to watch the dogs when I let them out. I’m maybe 50ft from the router and it works maybe 1 out of 4 tries. I’ve never had internet issues until this.
title: Horrible internet connection

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Lance & Kassi Nine
content: The picture quality on this is awesome!  We got a really great deal on this due to an amazon coupon so we were thrilled. We are still new to it and need to adjust the motion detection. At first we were getting constant notifications on our phones for motion and I was getting annoyed.  But after adjusting some settings I think we got it figured out.
title: Great picture quality!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: littlemisslexi
content: I couldn't be happier with our Ring Doorbell!! I was waiting to get it to see if we needed a Chime turns out we do not because we have multiple Echo Dots around our home. When the doorbell is pressed, the Echos all go off (you can select which ones do) and it is FANTASTIC! I LOVE this system SO much! Very happy & I highly recommend it!
title: The feeling of having extra security & peace of mind is amazing

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Omar A.
content: Terrible doorbell. The doorbell does not connect well with internet even though it is 10 feet away from the modem!! Not only that, every time I try to see the doorbell, it shows streaming error. Do not buy!!!!!!
title: Stay away from this cheap thing!!!!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Dream
content: I’m happy with my Ring Door Bell. I have no problems with mines and it came a day earlier than expected. Camera is so clear and I love how there’s 2 way talk!
title: I have no complaints

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: shopper
content: The worst. Writing this review while on hold with Amazon customer service. Horrid product. It is not like a Nest cam, which I have and love. Ring never picked up motion in front of my door (I live in an Enclosed apartment building). Nearly every food and amazon delivery had been missed this week- probably 10 deliveries- and I’ve never gotten a notification that a person walks by. Sooooo this is a completely useless product for me.
title: The worst. Shoulda gotten Nest.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: The Tusk
content: I purchased and installed the 1st Generation, installed it about a year ago. Needless to say,  I was not satisfied at all with the low video resolution and the lousy audio.  Just recently installed the 2nd Generation and boy, was I impressed. Excellent 1080i video resolution, much better audio, etc etc. No issue here, excellent!
title: Ring Door Bell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Brea Glenn
content: I'm so glad I made this investment. My echo dot sits on my kitchen counter and as soon as motion is detected Alexa let's me know. I've used it to communicate with postal delivery people twice beautifully and the chime feature is amazing.
title: Great investment

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Quizhat Kaddyshack
content: Cannot change the chime ringtone not recommended
title: What a piece of junk

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: GC
content: I just received my Ring doorbell yesterday. However, this review is more towards the neighbors group than the doorbell itself as I’ve only had it for a day. I purchased the Ring and chime on Wednesday after my very expensive bike was stolen from my property in the middle of the night. Received it Thursday afternoon and installed it right away. Soon after installation, I posted my stolen bike on neighbors (a feature of the Ring app). That night, one of my neighbors spotted the bike and called the police and notified me immediately. I met up in the area of where the police had been called and confirmed that it was indeed my stolen bike! I am so thankful for the people on neighbors that are really being good neighbors and helping each other out. This ring was a great investment! 10/10 recommend!
title: Great Investment

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Cyril Figgis
content: Its an upgrade to my old doorbell but would recommend getting the newer version the motion detection is faulty and isnt always accurate even on Highest motion Detection camera seems to miss several events. Wifi tends to drop even when the router is right next to it on the inside of the house. Mine is hardwire so its always connected to power.
title: Would recommend getting upgraded version

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: AHS
content: I am so happy that I decided to go with the RING camera and chime. It was very easy to install. It has excellent quality picture and it was super easy to install! I did it myself! And it included the tool for installation. Monitoring is extremely inexpensive. I almost hired an alarm company but their prices were ridiculous. CHIME offers a lot and cost far less. I highly recommend this item.
title: Best Investment Ever!!!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Perry L. Templeton
content: Even though I set up the detection zones for this device, it still doesn't register motion until the person is 3 feet away from my door. The line of sight up the walkway is about 15 feet and the video doorbell is set to max sensitivity. The recorded videos are even worse when registering and recording detection. The mode settings are set to Ring's recommendations.
title: Sluggish Response

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Adam Smith
content: Didn’t work at all and after being on the phone with RING tech support for over an hour - they couldn’t fix the issue either. DO NOT BUY RING!!!
title: DON’T BUY RING

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: mandeep sahota
content: This model is not very good, I had the previous ring doorbell where 1. you could take off the doorbell without having to take the security screws off all the way. 2. The motion detection on this is not working. Camera works on live view and when you press the doorbell but I'm not getting motion detection Anyone else have this problem??
title: Not happy

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Chris T. Brennan
content: The ring doorbell can solve one of the biggest problem of wondering. Who is currently at your front door of your house. When you are  unable to come to the door  with  the flexibility of adding more devices as you go.  And you will also need to provide WiFi access points in order to  get your doorbell to seamlessly connect to your internet
title: Works as described

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Ricardo
content: Works great, easy install. I suggest getting a ring power adapter if you don't have a doorbell system built into the home. You can hardwire this to a power outlet & never worry about recharging batteries.
title: Love it

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Steve
content: I don’t know why there are so many people hating on this product. It was super easy to install. Literally took me less than 5 minutes to hang it. The motion sensor is amazing and notifies me right away. People were complaining about the $30 a year for the storage and I think That’s a very small price to pay for my peace of mind. I’ve had it up for almost a week and the battery is at 94% so I’m guessing the battery life will last around 2 months which is not bad at all. Better then me having to run wires to it since I didnt  Have an existing doorbell. All and all I’d highly recommend this product and I will Be purchasing the ring flood light in the next month or two!
title: Great product!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Arielle
content: Bought this product last week and was so excited to try it since we have a blind spot at our front door. Installed the Ring which was very easy to set up. I set up the motion to not detect cars since we are about 70 ft. from the street and don’t want to detect every single car. Well, the motion detection is way too sensitive and and can detect the cars and the so-called “no animals detection” can detect every single animal including the lizards. The other night a “cat” burglar set off my Ring and woke me up. Lo and behold it was an actual cat that was staring at my Ring, I guess the light on the Ring had caught the cats eye. The night vision is great and it hasn’t dropped a wi-if signal yet.
title: Great Product, But Needs Motion Improvement

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: J.F.A.
content: Had it for a less than a month. Camera is big and bulky. System was also glitchy. If you want to see your videos you have to pay $3 a month. Not worth it. Ended getting another smaller camera without a monthly fee and I am very happy with that one, it even shows the recording 3 seconds before the motion sensor is activated.
title: There are way better options out there.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Jim P
content: This product name is confusing and this product is not an improvement. The battery is not replaceable, the motion detection is poor and not adjustable. I have older Ring Doorbells on my other home that I'm  happy with. This 2nd Gen I was not happy with and threw it in the trash and ordered the model I thought I had ordered.
title: Not an Improvement

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Diamond
content: This is a great item. Set up was pretty simple. I had to purchase shorter screws unfortunately because the others wouldn't work. I guess there's something metal blocking the use of the screws that came with the camera. Other than that, I'm pretty happy I finally purchased one. Getting another for my back door.
title: AWESOME

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Daniel Galvan
content: It was missing the mount that supposed to  be attached  to the wall.  Meaning the Ring doorbell I got was probably a return item. I thought I was paying for a new one.  I don't want to wait for a new mount from Ring or Amazon. So I'll be returning the Item.
title: Missing Mount. Probably received used Ring doorbell.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Erin G.
content: Hands down the worst home security product I’ve purchased (and we’ve been using cameras on our home for years). Battery life is terrible! Motion detection is horrendous! Connection to live view fails 90% of the time! Notifications don’t come through! Customer service is a joke! Take the advice of a customer who knows the competition, this product is next to useless - you may as well throw $100 down the toilet.
title: Hands down the worst home security product!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: douglas w
content: Very disappointed. When the motion is tripped I can't see on recording what happen right before that. It makes no sense, I have full time recording. When my brother parked in my driveway and it didn't set off motion, when I look back at video all I see is the vehicle. Not him pulling in the driveway, where did that go.
title: Not Happy

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: KTroyer6
content: Really glad I bought this, however it has a hard time distinguishing between a windy tree and a person. Didn’t realize I would have to buy a $30/yr. subscription to save recorded video. Video quality is lacking, suffers mild chromatic aberration. But for the price it was worth it. Looks great too. Good starter unit.
title: Ringle bells... ringle bells

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: TIM_IA
content: Works as advertised- it’s a little crazy on the motion stuff but you can turn alerting off of snooze it.  Hooked mind up to hard wire.  iOS app works great.
title: Great bang for the buck

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: JFSIV
content: The camera, it's visual angles, motion detection and doorbell function work really well. When I get a notice that the camera detects motion it takes at least 45-60 seconds for me to bring it up. This can be a problem if someone is waiting at the door. Folks nowadays just aren't very patient.
title: Hardware great. Software OK

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Brad Knight
content: The product itself is really awesome as well as the app that you download. The scam is having to pay a monthly fee to view your recordings. That’s right, the device records everything and is sent to the ring app and stored.  If you pay $3 per month you can view your older content not just a live view.
title: You have to pay for a subscription to view recordings

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Darlen Nohrn
content: wired as instructed so i would not have to deal with charging battery. 1 week after return policy expired it quit function  as advertise  displayed " batter too low  I also bought the show and it was not compatible with door bell i returned but spent lot of time trying to make it work  was later informed not even made by same company  your instructions for a lot of your products obviously written by a foreigner.  so much for you China stuff
title: i hard wired as instructed.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Kokkeus
content: Una excelente idea de protection de domicilio. Siempre que logres condenarlo a la red de WiFi y fue devuelto con promesa de devolution de dinero aprobado por Amazon, pero que hasta la fecha de hoy 07/08/2020 no aparece en mi cuenta Bancaria !!
title: Nunca funciono . Ni siquiera pudo realizar emparejamiento.....!!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Annie.
content: Very happy with this item! I read a lot of reviews on the first gen being bad with internet but this one is just great! Doesn’t cut off and notifies of movements. Every time. Great quality
title: Get it!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: M. L. Woodral
content: Works really well. Only drawback on my unit; since I didnt wire to my doorbell, I have to remove it and recharge the whole unit. Batteries I bought to switch out dont work and my unit apparently is a one piece sealed unit. I really like it and I may just end up wiring into the door bell.
title: Works really well

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: David R.
content: My wife always wanted me to get one and this one was worth the wait. It was a breeze to install. The install instructions very easy to follow. The app install instruction that you download walks you through with no hic=ups. Definitely will recommend this to friends. I wll be getting a second for my rear door.
title: Definitely worth it.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Kimberley D. Walters
content: I was super excited about purchasing this product. I know people who have it , as well as my mother who seems to love it , so I couldn’t wait to get one myself. The range of vision is great, I can see a good amount in our front yard. The motion is extremely accurate and goes quite the distance , I only wish it was able to see a little more on one side then the other . It gears more Towards the east of our property and less on the west, but that’s okay. The app is super easy to use and the install for this item took about 5 minutes , so it was another easy step. Overall, I’m thrilled I purchased this .
title: Love it!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: John T Gabler
content: Overall I like this doorbell camera.  It provides a clear picture.  The main downside to it is the charging.  I ordered a hardwired model to replace my existing doorbell.  If you read the fine print the hardwire is only for the doorbell chime itself.  It will only provide a “trickle charge” (aka will only charge when not in use) to the battery within the unit which means if it gets run down all the way you will still need to take it down and charge it with the USB cord.  That’s a pain in the A$$ when you have to unscrew wires and then leave them exposed while waiting for the unit to charge.
title: Good picture.  Horrible charging.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: David Lee
content: Ordered the product. It was a deal with a echo dot. Hard wired to my existing chime. And set it up. Huge disappointment on the motion detection. I get alerts from the ring when it detects cars making turns in front of my home(i live in cul-de-sac) but many times it doesnt detect my can when i come home and park my car on the driveway. It still doesnt detect me when i walk outside and move back and forth on my front yard(of course i am closer to my house than thise cars making turns ). I thought that the first device i received was a defect and asked for a replacement. But its the same with the second device. If it doesnt detect motions, what is it good for? Im thinking about retrning
title: Bad motion detection.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: anthony dipasquale
content: I have it hard wired to capture as much video as possible and it still misses a lot. the angle and quality of capture is good. but I live on a moderately busy street and it won't start recording until whatever is happening is already happened. so when I go back to review it I'll see only the tail end of activity. as far as a doorbell with a camera goes it's fine. but for surveillance you're going to miss a lot.
title: good doorbell. bad security recording if on busy area

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: ada
content: I am obsessed with our ring doorbell and amazon echo. Definitely a great buy. I love that ring has a neighborhood feature so people that have it in our area can post.
title: Get yourself a ring ASAP

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: meadow230
content: This is my second ring doorbell. It is the all new 1080p doorbell. It has been  working great. Setup is a breeze.  I have no problem with it connecting to my wifi. The picture is crystal clear and I love how you can adjust the settings to meet your needs. The battery has lasted me more than a month without recharging but I lowered the motion detection since I live near a busy road. No problems so far.
title: Ring a ding ding

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: tracker
content: Its beautiful, great quality video and pitcture etc. This is a great door bell, I love it. The coverage area is ller than the ring night light. Instead of having motion light and then vedio door bell I would recommend having motion light with video and normal door bell would give you must better coverage and the same information.
title: Its beautiful, great quality video and pitcture etc. This is a great door bell, I love it.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: g lopez
content: The Ring is a great product I have a couple of these  at my dads house and my residence and the work well. Also the recording and monitoring service is worth the money. Only thing that might be a problem is WiFi signal strength. I had get a device to boost signal strength other than that works great.
title: Great home safety device

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Goldeeloxxx
content: We decided to give this a try and love it! The picture is crystal clear and the motion sensor is on point. Installation was really easy also. It took maybe 10 mins. The ring app is awesome and you can change the settings to your preference and also see what’s going on in your neighborhood from others shared videos. Pretty cool.
title: Easy install, crystal clear video

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Stay Fancy LLC
content: I love my ring cameras. I have this door bell as well as 4 other cameras. I love how they are well integrated and easy to use. My 2 biggest gripes are sometimes the app takes too long to load. By that time whatever was at the front door is gone. Also, I wish I could keep my video up on a screen in my home. It times out after a short period of time.
title: Motion Detected at the front door

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: billnoble6894
content: My first unit, the battery did not charge. Brand new item and I had it charging for 10 hours with no improvement to battery percentage. I called customer service and they didn't help.  After several days, Ring reached out and solved my problem by shipping me a new unit.  New unit is working as expected.
title: 1st unit defective - 2nd works great

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Joanne M.
content: Very difficult to set up.  This is the second Ring.  Impossible to set up after the first one died.  Even tech support was not helpful and they were unable to help.  If it wasn’t for the fact that I spent over a hundred bucks, I’d throw it in the garbage.  Now I just don’t have any option with the Ring.  When I call I get someone from overseas that only give you lip service.  Gee thanks! If anybody
title: Ring doorbell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Hitchabout
content: PRETTY AWESOME DOORBELL! It Does the job, no complaints, yet. I have it hardwired it its doing the job. tried gen1 it had issues which was fixed in gen2, well the one i tried. So far I'm happy. Great support for the issues even through via FaceBook. AMAZING! BTW the thing it is in is on Thingiverse.
title: It Works Well

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Danny Cissell
content: The camera works great. However, it only catches tall trucks & my flags on my flag pole. Since my yard is inclined up to my front steps, my camera needs to have a wedge kit behind it. The book calls for it, however, they didn't send a wedge kit in this package. I guess will have to improvise, & make my own. Disappointed...
title: More parts required.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Karen San Filippo
content: We have had our ring doorbell generation two for a little over a month. We have tried to be very patient hoping that it would work but it wont the battery will not stay charged it only stays for about a half a day and then dies and when you charge it it only works intermittently to see outside movement
title: Poor quality

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: maria024
content: Got mines and it works great. I order two. One for myself and another one for my inlaw. Great deal.
title: Great camera

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Travis L.
content: The cameras are easy to install, love the bracket system and that they're rechargeable. Not a fan of the app, or the fact that the cameras are borderline useless without a paid subscription. The motion detection settings are too limited - either we live with false positives from cars driving by, or it fails to record package deliveries and other visitors. Compared to a certain competitor (also owned by Amazon, weirdly), these fail to measure up.
title: Requires a subscription to be useful; less intuitive than competitors; lots of false positives

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Georgia
content: I am not satisfied with the Ring doorbell. It won't connect to my existing chime. It isn't real sensitive and the alarm seems to be delayed. The video playback only works during the trial period unless you pay the $3 monthly ransom. Had I known this I wouldn't have bought it. Instead of paying a ransom, I will add cameras that I can control. So now I have a $90 doorbell that rings on my phone! Whoopee!
title: Need Subscription for Video

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Maru712
content: Imposible to install on the actual door. CERO instructions how to install it on the door. Costumer service doesn't know how to do it either.
title: no for the actual door

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: ruben
content: Todo
title: Bueno

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Mary O.
content: Paper weight. Unable to see video unless you buy warranty protection plan.  Motion doesn’t start until the person is walking away. If the person walks fast you won’t see them at all. Would not recommend!
title: Forced to buy warranty or you can’t see recordings

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Maribel
content: nice video and picture but the voice talk, it's not that clear. it's hard to hear another person to another side. Not sure if it's because of the internet or the device. I will give it a try for a month and if not I will return it.
title: the two ways talking it's not really that clear.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Lexi
content: I downloaded the app before the shipment arrived. I had already removed the old door bell. I was excited to get the ring door bell setup. Unfortunately the unit will not display any video or images. I get a streaming error. Help says check internet speed and connection strength. All show good. 100mb speeds. My other Amcrest devices connect without issue. I tried to get chat help but nope not for new device users. I spent 35 minutes on the phone with tech support for them to tell me my unit is defective and has to be replaced. Very disappointing for a brand new device. I will return and buy nest or arlo.
title: Let down

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Ariel Elia
content: We have went back and forth for a while on whether to get a ring door bell or not and I must say that I am so happy that we did! It gives us such peace of mind when we are gone to know that we can tell what is going on at our house. I can't imagine not having a video door bell now!
title: Love our new ring doorbell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: i dont knoe
content: Love my ring doorbell. I have 2 alexa shows so I can check my front door on those or on my phone. Its really nice when you have people at the door and you don't want to answer it. People in my town have them and alert everyone about bears caught on camera. It really helps keep the community safe.
title: Great item. A must have on every house.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: TH
content: Very misleading!  They fail to mention you have to unscrew and remove the Ring device in order to charge the battery!!!  It's fine if you can connect it to your existing doorbell, but if not, you have to unscrew it and remove it completely to charge.  Such a disappointment!
title: Such a disappointment!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Carrie
content: So far so good. I've shut off motion detection alerts because it does seem to have an effect on the battery consumption. So far everything works as it should and it's meeting my expectations.
title: meets expectations

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Brittany Yost
content: I installed my ring doorbell yesterday and already love it! It is a little sensitive about movement and I'm still adjusting the sensors to the perfect setting for my house. Since I live on the corner of a street it picks up a lot of movement during the day (which is annoying getting all the alerts since i work night shift and sleep during the day) but if anything is happening that you need to know about it will wake you up!
title: Love my ring!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: David Voelker
content: This is a piece of junk. I’m just to lazy to uninstall. That and I threw all packaging and the old doorbell in the trash so I need something. Attached wires but the old chime doesn’t ring. All tests were done and the chime itself works. It is the Ring that is a piece of s$&@. So many negative reviews on this new version. Never buying ring products again and just wasted this money.
title: Piece of crap!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Kimberley Carignan
content: Misleading description... I thought I was buying the same Ring 2 that I already have and love, but instead I received the Ring "Gen 2". I was upset when I realized there was no removable battery, but I figured I would give it a shot anyways. After 2 months, it doesn't maintain a wifi connection even though the Ring 2 I have never loses it and they are both close to our Fios router - we have no wifi dead spots in our house or the area outside of the door with the Gen 2 Ring. If I could, I would return and buy the "actual" Ring 2, but my return deadline passed. Thankful I didn't purchase the monthly package with this unit, like I did for the "actual" Rin 2 I have. Very disappointed!
title: Doesn't stay connected Wifi!!!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Rosa
content: Great camera! Had some problems connecting to the wifi at some points in time but overall amazing! Night vision sometimes turned black and white. Would totally recommend!
title: Great camera!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Ping Feng
content: I am very disappointed that only 2 days after I installed this Ring doorbell (2020 release), the night vision no longer works. My surrounding is well lit but either the recorded videos or live views are in total darkness and you can hardly see a person even as near as a few feet away. Not to mentioned the fact that motion detection is always delayed. Seeing so many positive reviews on this product, perhaps I bought a defective product and so have to return it for replacement. But the replacement will not be shipped until Mid-December!! Very disappointed!
title: Night vision not working 2 days after installation

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: odin2000
content: Wanted to use my existing chime, but it won't even after I did all the checks. Wanted to link it to both Alexa and Google Home but it won't link to Google Home
title: Difficult to setup

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: M Kindred
content: I love this Doorbell!  This is the best Doorbell you can find on Amazon. When there’s motion it records for 20 seconds but that is way better at 15 or 10. When it is nighttime the ring light turns on to tell people to say hey the Doorbell recording. So all that to say this is the best Doorbell on the market!
title: Best Doorbell on the market!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: john hewitt
content: door bell difficult to connect to wifi. customer service really sucks. second device purchased. getting to customer service and talking to someone with any intelligence is impossible. will buy something else in the future. RING products and  service are TERRIBLE!
title: do not buy

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Sam
content: Really Nice video doorbell like ring's design.
title: Nice

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: elizabeth
content: There are other brands of Video Doorbell systems that allow you to use an SD card to save content or store content in the cloud. Im giving the Ring 1 star because I read the user's agreement!
title: Read the users agreement dont be illiterate

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Bekkah
content: love this, but too sensitive sometimes. I tried changing settings on app & it still picks up cars diving by....
title: Perfect for front door.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Figero
content: The screws on the bottom will fall out when removing to charge the battery.  first generation you can just loosen the screws a little and leave in the unit.  The screws are very small and can be lost easily.  This makes securing the unit to the mount as two person job.  one to hold the unit in place and the other to screw in the tiny screws without losing them.
title: Not as good as first generation

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Pickle
content: Got this as part of home security system.  Very nice to see who is at the door, especially when I am home alone.  Motion detection is a little sensitive - it forgets to ignore the cars on the road sometimes.  Overall, a great product and well worth the money!
title: Very helpful

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Robert J. Carlson
content: Supposedly works with solar charger accessory, does not work at all with solar charging. It is impractical to run on battery alone.  If you don't have a pre-wired site or are unwilling/unable to run a power supply to this device, it is a total waste of money.
title: Misleading capability

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: LDILUZIO
content: It was easy to install and set up. The app works well. Subscription for video storage is a negative. I have the rechargeable version (no wiring) so have to take out security screws to bring unit in and charge. Its been up for about a month and have not had to charge yet. I will update when it needs charging. Need to purchase a wireless chime because without notifications on phone did not work.
title: Does its job!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Randy F. Mcdonald
content: Easy to install & connected right away to my WIFI. I had to p[purchase the wedges because of a high front porch and that fixed the problem of it picking up cars on the road going by. $100  a month after 30 day free trial for the server recordings well worth it.
title: Great so far!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Ansley Taylor
content: It’s okay. I bought it to watch my car at night. The pros are it’s very clear, the sound is loud and clear, and the motion sensitivity can be changed in the APP. The cons are not deal breakers, but annoying. The motion detection is a little delayed. This could just be my WIFI. You have to purchase a subscription to record history. It doesn’t come with the chime box, you must purchase this separately. All in all it’s okay. It serves its purpose.
title: It’s Okay

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Cameron
content: Making me pay a subscription to have a camera I already paid for record to your app is ridiculous. I understand charging for 24/7 monitoring but the camera should record if it senses motion whether or not I'm subscribed to 24/7 monitoring.
title: Why would you charge for the ability for a video camera to record a video?

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Pololvr
content: So happy with this purchase. Our new development has been victim to porch theft.  As a claim investigator I also know how great this video is for preserving facts.  So easy to install.  Plan to add on and hopefully Amazon will have good holiday pricing.
title: Ez set up - great picture

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: LzTP
content: I like the concept, but it can take a long time to connect to the video, which defeats the purpose if the person has already walked away. Battery life depends on settings, so in order to save battery life, you forego higher sensitivity settings and longer recordings.
title: Room for improvement, but overall good

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: NJChris
content: It doesn't work much. Does not stay connected to WIFI. Won't connect and there are gaps in motion detection. I have upgraded my WIFI and still no help. Every other device works as described on WIFI this is the only one that fails to stay connected. Wish I can return it.
title: When it works it good. but...

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Jhfroug
content: After sending back a competing product that never worked right I sprang for the extra money and bought the Ring. The first unit they sent me was faulty and I though “Here we go again” but they quickly sent me a replacement that worked just fine and has been flawless since.  I don’t know how I lived without it for so long!
title: Excellent product with great customer service.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Carol Gonzalez
content: Not what I expected. I had to get a WiFi booster which works great. However, even though I have great signal, most of the time it will not connect and I do not get any alerts! What’s the point of the membership of $30 that I just bought, if my ring doesn’t capture any video! And, if I have to reset it I have to take out the security screws and take it off the plate to do it! Big hassle! Would not buy again!
title: Would not buy again

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: heidi
content: Love these so far, we have had 2 set up for our property. The motion detection is a little fussy closer to the road, it picks up random cars driving by but not always, even with us adjusting the sensitivity. Night vision also works well, does to black and white when it starts to get dark! Works well in the rain too, we've had a couple hefty storms so far with no issues.
title: Awesome

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Terria
content: Very happy with product! The easiest thing I’ve ever installed!
title: Great product and price

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Edith Robertson
content: 7/26/2020 whom ever I spoke too over the phone hung up on me ! Waiting on UPS too pick up the broken ring the chin works but not the 2 ND gen waiting on replacement one!
title: That I get my ring doorbell camera up and running ASAP

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Devey
content: I love this doorbell. It's given us the added protection we were looking for. We hardwired the doorbell in, and I definitely recommend doing that.
title: Added protection

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: JMer
content: It’s fun to have when it works.  There is a lag in the motion detection so if the person coming to your door is fast you’ll only get video of them walking away, if it even notifies you at all.  Recently our house chime (not triggered by the doorbell anymore) will start ringing and won’t stop until you flip the breaker.  We’ll most likely be sending this unit back.
title: Ugh

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Judy Smith
content: We have been annoyed all summer with door to door salesmen. Now we don’t have to answer the door. It is also a safety feature that gives us some sense of security. It took longer to install than we thought but once we got it installed it works great.
title: Worth the money

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Dahmie
content: I love haveing the Ring video doorbell. I even get updates on crime in the surrounding neighborhoods.  I  have it connected to Alexa so I get added security detection. I have it hardwired where my doorbell used to be so no need to remove and recharge the batteries.
title: All-new Ring Video Doorbell –1080p HD video, improved motion detection,  Satin Nickel (2020 release)

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Randall
content: Privacy Issues here.  Now Amzn and the people they sell their data to can view our property too!
title: Dont Care for Smart Product that want to connect to my Wifi.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: SisterSister
content: This Ring is awesome. It has very clear picture and sound. For the price, I had to buy it. The only complaint I have is that it is a little bigger than I thought it would be. If you are looking to try to fit it in a smaller space, then the slim Ring would probably be better.
title: Great Quality!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Jevaughn Thomas
content: My wife and I always wanted a ring doorbell camera and finally got one. It was very easy to install and setup. The one I love the most is how clear the image is even at night. I definitely recommend this to anyone. In today's world you can't have enough eyes.
title: Awesome doorbell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: MDockerty
content: Easy to set up and easy to install. It does everything it says. The plans are 3.00 -month or 30.00 for the year. You can get the other plan that has more protection. But I started with the basic plan. I am happy with my purchase.
title: Great product

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Patrick
content: This is a must have! I love being able to see who’s outside, and have the doorbell sound throughout the house with an Alexa device in every room. I haven’t been able to access the live video outside of the house, i still have yet to see if that works as good. But i overall love it!
title: Amazing for only $80!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Joshua Kelley
content: In my house I used to miss packages all the time or guests. we had no doorbell and its a rental so I could not install one. This door bell and water proof 3m strips made it all possible. I now not only have a door bell, but a motion sensor and camera. I also like the layout with the app. The only downside is that it cannot talk with my google home and I do not like Alexa.
title: Better than I hoped it would be.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Mario Martinez
content: Purchased this version to replace the original version. I’m glad I didn’t go with the pro. This one works just fine. No need to spend the extra money.  The video clarity is really nice compared to the original. Easy to install and load onto ring app.
title: Ring 2 works just fine

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Powell
content: Video is delayed delayed...... delayed.  Sometimes for a few minutes.  Not a wifi speed issue.  By the time the video catches up, the person is long gone....useless footage by then. Connected to both cell phone and alexa/echo.
title: Delayed delayed delayed video

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Klaus Feldam
content: I have three Ring Doorbells amd very pleased with the improvements of the latest model; HD and better night vision. I am still hoping to have the same camera features in my Ring Doorbells and Ring Floodlights to have consistency in my alarm and monitoring set-up. What on earth did we do before Ring, Alexa, Wyze and Philips Hue?
title: Improved camera quality and night vision

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: GigglinGoth
content: The doorbell is great and works extremely well. Picture is very clear. Super easy to install which is good since the only downfall with this one, that I could find, is that in order to charge it you have to remove the entire unit to do so
title: Works very well, great price

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: turtledude
content: I guess I got one of the good ones. Finished the full charge and started to add the bottom mounting screw when poof smoke everywhere. This thing was hot I’m glad I have a cbs home otherwise I could see a major fire, this thing was extremly hot for at least five minutes. Wish I could return it but In trashed the box a few days ago thinking this was an easy install.
title: Quality product

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Shannon Greenland
content: Works exactly as described and gives me great piece of mind knowing my home is being protected. Battery lasts a long time and the video is very clear.
title: Long lasting battery.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Thomas Resler
content: This item was very easy to setup. I was going to pay someone to install this item. However, when I open the box and read the instructions I took the big leap to install it myself. WOW it was so easy and no issues. Saved $100 by not hiring someone to do this simple install. The only issue I have is I can't figure out how to turn the volume up on the door camera.
title: Great product and easy install.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Gone 2 WYD
content: This product is like a scam pushing for you to purchase their online service. It has no memory so it only records to Ring online cloud storage that you would have to subscribe to and pay monthly.  I didn’t realize that I can’t review previous recordings now that the month free trial ended and it is too late to return it. Buyer beware or you’ll be caught like I am with partial features from the Ring 2.
title: Do not purchase

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Karen Mikijanis
content: I just want to return this doorbell. When you purchase the protective plan and try to get back into the app on your phone you can't. I have been trying for 4 hrs to get someone to help and I either understand them on the phone or they keep telling my email or password is incorrect and it'e the same one I use to get the doorbell. I am so disgusted and just want my money back!!!!!!!
title: I thought I would like it , but!!!!!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Larry Rosenberg
content: The unit I received wouldn’t hold a charge. Battery was no good. Didn’t want to return it to Amazon. Called Ring support and they were great. Replaced the unit and sent me a return label too. All is good. Love the Ring door bell!
title: Signals my phone, Apple Watch and Alexa!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: ofelia casillas
content: This product is not effective. When you are away from your home and batteries are low the product does not work. Batteries need to be recharged periodically. I connected to electricity but it works with batteries only. If you are on long vacation your camera does not work until you comeback and recharge it. A waist of money.  Don’t buy it.
title: A bad product. Inefficient. Do not buy it

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Barbara k
content: This model of the ring that we received did not open according to Amazon installation instructions. It took speaking to 4 people to get help opening the ring to install.  You need to use a butter knife to open it. It also did not Come with the wedge and wire extender that ring says comes with it.
title: Needs  better installation information for this model.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: AG
content: It’s excellent overall. Only con is having to pay to record any video after the free trial.
title: Must pay for subscription to record

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Amanda P.
content: When the Ring doorbell works it is great. The video quality is nice and clear. The issue I have is that once a week its been getting disconnected from the WiFi and I have to do a soft restart in order for it to start working again. Very frustrating.
title: Great when it works but often disconnects from WiFi

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Kris pillai
content: The image is acceptable, nothing to rave about compared with other camera. However, the manufacturer’s intend to maintain a permanent recurring charge of 3$ per month is a greedy tactics. Without the monthly subscription the camera is only good for live view. When there are plenty of other products in the market without this subscription requirement, this product and its manufacturer’s service is way below average, downright unacceptable.
title: Without subscription this camera doesn’t have anything to brag about!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: John
content: Picture good works well the 3.00 per month for storage is kind of a bummer, tech support was very good although I did not need them, set up flawless and very easy, 100.00 a year, why not support a good product, make sure your WiFi is strong at door before buying
title: Good product, excellent tech support

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Brenda Thammavong
content: At first I really like but after three weeks I hate it so much because it’s always asked to reconnect and kept spinning. What’s the point to having it when I don’t see any shit from the camera???
title: Make sure a product is better quality!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Neal
content: The lens quality and resolution are outstanding, under all lighting conditions.  Great view range.  Very high quality construction, and super easy installation with supplied tools and hardware.  Setup is a breeze.  This Gen-2 was just released, and price is great.  About my only suggestion is to improve software layout and navigation a bit.  It's not bad, that's only a first impression.  I just could not wait to review my first Ring device.  It won't be the last.
title: Amazing value

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: CrazedMonkey
content: Easy to install, yearly membership for one device is more than reasonable. Motion works well, very little false alarms when set up properly. I recommend the wired connection, always stays charged.  The picture and video is very clear ..
title: Picture is Perfect

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Kiah Garrido
content: It arrived a day late and you have to subscribe to record footage and have the ability to look back at any events that may Occur. Without that you only see what’s happen in the moment or get notifications for motion or someone ringing the doorbell, over all though I am happy with it and does make me feel a bit better while at home for myself and my family.
title: Over happy

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Michael C McDonald
content: When it does work its great. It sends me a notification that there is motion and and I can look at it to see whats going on. The ring notification is also nice. The problem is for some reason when I click on the live view it only works maybe a quarter of the time, it just keeps saying its "Activating device" which doesnt make sense because a lot of the time it had just detected motion which should mean its already on. It never connects the live video. I have it close to my router and everything but only works some times.
title: Detects motion but live view never works.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Twin Rivers AC & Refrigeration inc. in fort lauderdale
content: awesome. works great & is an intercom and video to speak live from anywhere real time.  the description on ring leads you to believe the video in this $99 ring doorbell are not so great & the next gen is way better because it’s pricier. NOT TRUE. this video is mint. even at night. whats not to love for $100; buy one today
title: you’ll fall in love with it; I promise!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Wanda Thompson
content: I have a home security system around my house but bought the Ring because we actually didn’t have a regular doorbell, nor did we have a 2-way audio system. Since hooking it up I have fallen in love with it. Even my 82-year-old dad will ring the doorbell when I’m not home just so I can see and talk to him. It’s very convenient and so easy to set up!
title: Even an 82-year-old can use it!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Mayra E
content: Very convenient. Good to have to see live footage and saves history events when motion is triggered.  You can also speak to people at the door and it alerts you with motion sensor if it detects a person. Good security for front of the house.
title: Good Image, Convenient

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Janet
content: This is the 2nd one that I have bought. This one was for my son and family. I wanted them to be safe while sleeping, as they live in a big city and is always changing where it is safe or not. This was perfect for them!
title: I love this doorbell!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Bernie Groome
content: Installation was more difficult than anticipated. Also I recently hand to change my router and connecting the Ring to the new router required me to physically remove the Ring from the outside wall and do a entire new installation.
title: Works as Advertised but installation is not as advertised

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: GM Sloat
content: I purchase the Ring Doorbell on July 7th and by August 7th it would no longer take a charge.  I left the item on charge for 10 hours as instructed,, still would no charge.  I will not buy another one, went back to a simple doorbell. I would not recommend this to anyone.
title: Not charging.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Geekyjerry
content: I really enjoy it and it's exactly what I wanted . I was debating between this one and the pro I hardwired this one to my existing doorbell connection and it work well it charges the battery while it's on there the only difference is that it doesn't have the pre-roll which isn't a big deal for me.
title: I love it.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Nancy Iveth Zamora
content: Bought as a gift to my sister since we love our ring. She did not have a doorbell so they loved the conviene to be able to have a doorbell and feel safe. Definitely recommend as a gift to give someone with a new home.
title: New Home Gift

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Shawn Poole
content: Well I don’t understand why I got a pay a monthly bill to see my history and record history to look back at it to pay $32.85 or $100 monthly I don’t understand that why.  But after all the camera is good it needs to be fixed with the connection is a bit blurry ‼️
title: Monthly bill

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Cayla
content: I actually caught someone trying to steal something off of my porch with this not even a week after I got it. Sooo I’m really glad I bought this and would buy it again. I actually got my sister to buy this and other security cameras from ring.
title: Amazing

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Jessica L
content: Have used several different bands of door bell. Ring used to be the leader in this field. But sadly to say not any more. Since I have a google home hub. I prefer door bells from other brand. Ring is just a ok door bell.
title: Not a bad door bell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Tavis Spencer
content: We LOVE this doorbell camera! Still trying to configure the correct motion detection but we have been having a blast making faces and scaring each other. Still wanna catch the pesky dog owner not picking up poop though.
title: Love it!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Roger J
content: The product is great no issues . My complaint is that I was upgrading from the original Ring and expected to just take off the old and put on the new. However the Ring2 gets wired to the unit not the mount so i needed to shut off the fuse and rewire . Of course the wires were not long enough so i needed to extend them . So the product is great but if you’re upgrading just realize it’s a completely new install . The mounting brackets at least had the holes in the same place.
title: Pain to upgrade

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Stephen
content: This is my 2nd one. The 1st one was the 1st generation. It was great at 2st. It started now recording when people walked up to my house. So I thought that if I bought the news one that it would be better. But this is even worse. Its does the samething but worse. And if I go and look at what it did record it takes forever to load if it loads at all.
title: Not happy!!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Faatimah
content: I’m so happy I finally got this and the price it was shown for on prime day was amazing! This comes in handy especially since I live in an apartment and often times I don’t know who is standing out my door. It always notifies me when there is any motion outside which is super helpful.
title: Great!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: AlexandraMGriffin
content: We received the doorbell today and my husband had it installed in 10 minutes after it was charged. He set it up with the existing wiring so that we do not have to charge it.  We can see our entire porch which is large and the night vision is great. We also set it up where it just detects people because it was sensing cars going down the street. So far so good!
title: Great Ring Doorbell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Robert L.
content: Much better picture, seems to have better battery life and definitely has better features
title: Much better video!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: george fernandez
content: For $100 this camera should be elite. I’ve had better bootleg Chinese cameras for cheaper. One heavy rainstorm and the camera was water damaged. Pathetic. And it doesn’t detect all motion.
title: Pathetic.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Frances
content: Got this for $79. I get it for my aunt and she loves it! The night vision is soooo good!
title: Great price!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Carmenlita Locke
content: It was easy to assemble, and it's great quality. Highly recommend this product!
title: Excellent Buy!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: AmazonUser
content: Seemed to work OK (hardwired and strong WiFi connection) initially. Not great or good, just OK. After the 30 day trial recording it turned into an over sensitive piece of junk. Alerting on every car, animal and garbage blowing down the street. No matter how many times I adjusted the motion settings. I will never subscribe to something that can be done for free. So... I will be ripping this out, burning it in the back yard and dance on its ashes. Not recommended. Save your money and opt for a doorbell cam with local storage.
title: Junk

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: donald harbert
content: I had to spend 30 minutes on the phone with support (after 10 minutes on the web site getting my verification number) to get the doorbell connected.  Apparently if your phone has cellular data turned on, the doorbell might not connect to your phone.  Melvin was very helpful and got me through it but nothing in the instructions or on the Ring web site said anything about having to turn off cellular data.  Total time of searching and the support call was about 2 hours.  It should not have been this hard.
title: Installation instructions not complete

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: jeff e
content: Don’t buy unless you want to pay a monthly subscription fee
title: Subscription fee

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: S
content: Love this camera! Works perfectly. I also ended up buying the $30.00/year subscription. It loses a lot of its value without the record feature - but $30.00 isn't bad for an entire year. Well worth it.
title: Great product

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Dave
content: This is a must-have. When someone rings your bell it comes through the phone app. You can just monitor with your phone as well. Really easy to install. Just download the app, make an account and thats all you need.
title: Super easy to install and use.
