product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Charles Dugand
content: Garbage. Started off unable to remove bracket. That took support staff. Turned out it had to be pried off the back with a knife but there were no instructions to that effect. Then it would not connect to the internet. After another long call to support...nothing. It wouldn’t connect. They were only too willing to keep trying but I wasted an entire evening doing something that shouldn’t have taken more than 20 minutes. Extremely poor design.
title: Garbage. Be careful

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Trapperdt
content: Live view never loads; does not begin recording until someone has rung the bell or taken about 10 steps on porch.  Video quality is good but needs to begin recording much sooner.
title: Not up to expectations

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Debra L. Maynard
content: Great Amazon Prime day deal!!! Took about 10 minutes to install. 5 minutes to completely set up on android phone.  Works great and viewing area is better than I expected.
title: ring door bell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: chrissy
content: This was an afforable option to give us the security we were wanting! The night vision is super clear. It was also super easy to install, and the app is SO user friendly!
title: Great affordable doorbell!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Lisa G
content: I was very happy with this product.  It was very easy to install, the video and pictures are very clear.  Most definitely worth the money.  Would highly recommend.
title: GREAT FOR SECURITY

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Drummerboy
content: Had to call to get inside doorbell to ring when button pushed.. help was very professional.
title: Ring my doorbell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Roberto
content: Just love it
title: Keeps my family safe

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Steve Tolzy
content: Just set this up today, instructions were easy to follow, and it seems to work well. Night vision is good. Very sturdy and the security screws are nice to keep it from being removed.
title: Looks good so far

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Ada A. Perez
content: I'm trying to buy this set again for a gift, but it is not available at Amazon, love the 3rd generation Ring doorbell the image and color are clear even at night time and the Echo dot
title: Great combo and price

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Llamalana
content: The video quality is OK at night it’s OK. It kind of stinks that it only goes for 30 seconds at a time and you could adjust it to 60 seconds but big whoop. It’s iffy when motion detects. But saying all that I am overall pleased with the product it was an easy install a connect to my Wi-Fi pretty well.
title: Ring is ok but getting better as time has passed

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Brian
content: The unit is slow, from the time I get an alert, and open the app, the delivery is over, everyone is gone. Its way behind the curve. You must purchase the monthly service because you can't see anything live, but you can review who has come and gone. Not intended as a security device in my opinion, but you can tell when your package was dropped off. Even if its after the fact.
title: Its a good toy - not for serious users

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: jonathan boover
content: Garbage, what a waste. Can only view about 20 seconds of what is activated when you get a montion detection alert/notifications. So much of if it is just leafs blowing in the wind. Will be looking into another system.
title: Annoyingly not user friendly

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Richard Hudson
content: Amazing item!  Really easy setup and the video is terrific....so much so, we ordered another for the back patio.  Just a great purchase and fast delivery too!  Can’t beat it!
title: Amazing item!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: abdeltif aboubi
content: I like the door ring camera, the only issue is you have to pay for video recording either $3,or $ 10 a months which is  petty much little expensive.Also, Amazon does not mention any storage fees before hand .
title: Recording fees, storage fees .

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Christine
content: video is great. 3 hour lag in alert. My cheap camera works better
title: Don't waste your money

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Happy Shopper
content: Easy to set up and use except when you are setting up, the instructions say to push the orange button, which is on the doorbell, but to get to it, you have to pull up on the door bell to remove it from holder.  They don't tell you this until near the end of the instructions.  It took me a while to figure it out.  I didn't want to break anything, but it does easily lift up and off.
title: FYI for set-up

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Cecilia Rubio
content: Love this, easy set up and so nice to not pay $300 for it like the other versions. Does the job for only $79, $60 with a coupon! Best money I ever spent!
title: Best money spent

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Trish rothan
content: Update: Ring support contacted me after this review and they are helping me resolve the issue. I will update my review again as it gets resolved. Half of the time the video is just black and at the very end it will come on but it’s too late. The other half of the time it Detects someone after they are already gone and when I watch the video there is nothing on it. It detects someone way too late
title: Working on issue

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Ann
content: When speaking through the mic it is delayed by the time the person hear what your saying they are already walking off. I’m using the WiFi no batteries. When you get a motion or person at the door by the time you check to see they are gone already
title: Delay voice through mic

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: jeanne
content: Love it. It is amazing how much you can see sitting in your house. Tried it from 20 miles away and was very pleased with what I could see at my front door and yard.
title: Worked well for me.

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: richieggg
content: Good value and works as expected. Easy setup.
title: Love it!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Elizabeth
content: Everything has worked out well so far with my ring doorbell. I have to use the battery powered function and it’s been working for well over a week now without needed to be recharged. That was my biggest concern.
title: Perfect little security camera for front door!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: John Heaston
content: I finally got the Ring doorbell to talk to the Echo - not through my Alexa tablet, but from my laptop. Shouldn't have been so complicated or taken so long. It wasn't "easy" to connect. Be prepared to use your technology experience and lots of Googling for answers.
title: Ring connection to the Echo

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: AC
content: After recieving an alert of motion at your door. I cant view the footage. You cant do playback functions without a subscription. And Live View won't connect EVER. Defeats the whole purpose of the product. So why would I purchase a subscription to something I already paid for that doesn't work?
title: Garbage

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Angie
content: Very disappointed in the device it will pick up. Bugs flys cats but not detect people nor record anyone walking up to the house. The ring customer service is no help and will tell you that your internet is slow. The ring will need to be placed next to the router for it to fully work...Will be returning
title: Horrible

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: LC
content: Disappointed that you have to pay a $30 per year subscription for any memory. Without it you only get a live shot. Takes a while to get the motion detection right. Otherwise it’s working well.
title: No Memory

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: madhavi fale
content: What an amazing product.  Clarity is really good.  Works with Alexa,  can't wait to try with my echo show. Sensor sometimes doesn't work as effective as it should but overall love it
title: Amazing product

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: angela
content: the ring is great, works as it states, not happy with the echo dot, the sound is muffled. order a hanger designed for the dot, but it still sounds like the sound is coming through a funnel
title: ring is great, dot not so much

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Ed
content: Works great, few issues I have is lag time when trying to do live view at times and its integration with an existing doorbell chime. Other than that its great to have.
title: Great product but not without its flaws

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Tris
content: My friend had this and it works great for her.  I was unable to get it set up, and didn't have time to call their service.  If you have patience and tech savvy, it is great
title: Great udea

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: MS
content: really like it more than we thought  I should have gotten the chime also in case I don't have my phone with me  Like the app and options  I had to turn off some notifications, it was going off constantly  Wish I had waited till last week when amazon prime day had fab sale!
title: great view

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Kayla
content: This doorbell is awesome. I live the fact that now I can see who is coming and going near my house. The video is clear as day and so is the night vision. It detects very well and the range is very wide well worth the money
title: Live this doorbell

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: PS
content: - Clever Marketing SCAM using the term "ALL NEW" - It actually means updated the 1ST GEN System. So u r NOT getting latest tech - Runs on 2.4Ghz only ( not 5 ) - video is good if ypundont want zoom in on anything - motion sensor is super sensitive so u gotta play with it for awhile so u don't get passing cars. - cool "person only" option instead of everything that moves
title: Get what you pay for...

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Bernard
content: Setup and installation was very easy. Follow the video setup and you cannot go wrong. If you don't have a wired doorbell you will have to take the doorbell off and charge it whenever it goes dead.
title: Very easy!

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Theresa Wooten
content: On with tech support no less than 15 times.  Finally, they are sending me a new device.  Of course I have to return the one I have.  No problem because it doesn't work anyway.  Must say their customer service is superior.
title: Disappointed

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Kiccykiccy
content: If you ever change the password you will need to set it up from the beginning again . Works so well I had to get two more . My family invested in ting as well . Ty
title: Great investment

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Destiny Knopf
content: I wish the motion detection was a little further in range. It seams to be in consistent at times. At time It also will not detect motion until someone rings the doorbell. I feel like I may be play a game of hit or miss with watch i catch
title: Still on the fence

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: scott p
content: Wasn't sure about it at first but after a simple setup I'm very impressed by it.  Picture is very clear day or night and the motion detection is very sensitive.
title: Very happy

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Allan Beckwith
content: Easy setup and installation. Comfort in knowing I have a way to watch over my house and check for package delivery
title: Awesome product

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Jackie408
content: I love my Ring it makes me feel safe and it lets me know what’s going on the the neighbor hood , I can see who’s at my front door before I answer it yeah I’m happy 😊
title: Happy Customer

product: All-new Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection, easy installation – Venetian Bronze (2020 release)
author: Lindy V. Wood
content: I love this Ring video doorbell.  The video works fabulous with clear vision and speech.  You can have a conversation and understand each other.  Love it!

Following advice of several troubleshooting videos, I tried to reinstall 3 times, with the same result. It acts like it reboots, and it responds to two or three "motions" with no video or live view. The return window closed after one month. Ridiculous. Hoping to get some resolution with Ring corporate. We paid $33 to save the videos for a year, so we expect resolution or there will be further negative updates on this review.
